TaskDescription: Do some exercise and repeat whole process for the green light. There is a shortcut, so you don't have to activate configuration every time code is update. Just click the login icon and select Login with online change option in pop up window. If there are no errors, updated code is downloaded and already running on PLC! Otherwise, they will be displayed in Error List and login will proceed without download. If instructions don't specify, leave the previous code as it is, because it might be needed in further steps. Hold red and green buttons for 1 second to pass the test
